item.title: blockreassurance - Change the position of the bloc in products pages
item.description: blockreassurance - Change the position of the bloc in products pages Details Component : blockreassurance Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-550 Steps Step Description Expected result Select principal column" " A message should be display in green Go to the front office in a product page The bloc reassurance should be display Select None" " A message should be display in green Go to the front office in a product page The bloc reassurance shouldn’t be display
